annotations.description: The Long Island: One of The Most popular cocktails in History! Note on this video: I mention that Cointreau is made from a Neutral grain spirit macerated wit...
annotations.title: Top 5 Long Island Ice Tea Cocktails - Easy Cocktails

textContent:
.75oz lemon juice
.75oz simple syrup
.5oz gin
.5oz vodka
.5oz light rum
.5oz silver tequila
.5oz triple sec

Shake over ice and pour over ice. 
Top with cola. 

AMF: blue curacao instead of triple sec. Sprite instead of coke. 
Long Beach Iced Tea: Cranberry juice instead of coke. 
Tokyo Tea: Midori instead of triple sec. Sprite instead of coke. 
Texas Tea: Bourbon instead of triple sec. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oe_AuNM_rPY&t=9s
title: Long Island Iced Teas
